parameters.name: BackupGatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup gateway that is used to download the backup set.

parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup schedule.

parameters.name: BackupSetDownloadDir
parameters.description: The server directory to which the backup set is downloaded.

parameters.name: BackupSetDownloadTargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the destination server to which the backup set is downloaded.

> Set the value to agent, which indicates a server on which a backup gateway is installed.

parameters.name: BackupSetDownloadTargetTypeLocation
parameters.description:
The type of the destination directory to which the backup set is downloaded. This parameter is required if the automatic download feature is enabled. Valid values:

- local

- nas

- ftp

- minio

> Default value: local.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: FullDataFormat
parameters.description:
The format in which the full backup set is downloaded. Valid values:

- Native

- SQL

- CSV

- JSON

> Default value: CSV.

parameters.name: IncrementDataFormat
parameters.description:
The format in which the incremental backup set is downloaded. Valid values:

- Native

- SQL

- CSV

- JSON

> Default value: Native.

parameters.name: OpenAutoDownload
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the automatic download feature. Default value: false.
